name: True Herban Crossroads - Men's
description: For every shirt we sell, we will donate a Cup of Soup to Feed the Hungry of Chicago. The "Crossroads" designs symbolizes Choice, Power and Potential. In life there are choices, and we have the power to make decisions. At each crossroad, there is unlimited potential. The design focuses on those potential points with intersecting lines and outward pointing arrows. Shirt Details: Material: Organic Cotton Ink: Low-Impact Water Based Inks Origin: Made in the USA Touch: Super Soft Please click the FAQ tab for our sizing descriptions Limited Quantity Printed

name: Breaking the Law: Since 1776 - Men's
description: Incredibly soft to the skin, this organic cotton, American made tee will have you looking great, and feeling even better! You will walk proudly for choosing a shirt that was grown chemical free, and made by an American worker who was paid a fair wage. Go ahead, brag to your friends, family and coworkers how your t-shirt is a part of the solution! The Design The "Breaking the Law: Since 1776" design represents the core values and beliefs of our founding father and symbolizes our unalienable Rights, that among these are Life, Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness. Shirt Details: Material: Organic Cotton Ink: Low-Impact Water Based Inks Origin: Made in the USA Touch: Super Soft Please click the FAQ tab for our sizing descriptions *Limited Quantity Printed* History Lesson On July 4, 1776, the Continental Congress announced that the thirteen American colonies regarded themselves as independent states, and no longer a part of the British Empire. The American Revolution was the political upheaval during the last half of the 18th century in the which thirteen colonies in North America joined together to break free from the British Empire, combining to become the United States of America.

name: Go Green or Go Home - Men's
description: The "Go Green or Go Home" design represents the ecological footprint that we each create from our every day activities, and calls out for us to be aware of the impact on the environment we have, and try to reduce our footprint. Start with one of the basic necessities of life, Clothing. It's that easy! Shirt Details: Material: Organic Cotton Ink: Low-Impact Water Based Inks Origin: Made in the USA Touch: Super Soft Please click the FAQ tab for our sizing descriptions Limited Quantity Printed

name: The Classic
description: Minimally Designed, Classically Inspired This minimalist design, combined with a super soft white organic cotton t-shirt will never go out of style and is a great way to showcase the True Herban brand. The awesome tee is versatile from lounge wear, to casual, and can even be dressed up with a sleek sport coat or cardigan. Perfect for the summer time! Shirt Details: Material: Organic Cotton - 4.2 oz., pre-shrunk 100% combed ringspun Ink: Low-Impact Water Based Origin: Made in the USA Collar: Coverstitched Sleeves: Hemmed Limited Quantity Printed Measurements Chest Width S - 18.5 M - 20 L - 21.5 XL - 23 2XL - 24.5 Total Length S- 28.5 M - 29.5 L - 30.5 XL - 31.5 2XL - 32.5 Watch the Making of Video:

name: Hecho En America
description: Hecho En America is a direct translation to Made In America. This shirt symbolizes the idea that America has always been known for being a melting pot of the world, and is known for our diverse cultural population. True Herban Clothing is paying a tribute to a highly regarded symbol that is stamped on most Mexican made products. Helping to show that no matter where you're from or what language you speak, we can all do our part to make this a better country. We can all do it by contributing sustainable and domestic products that hep develop our communities. Shirt Details: Material: Organic Cotton Ink: Low-Impact Water Based Inks Origin: Made in the USA Touch: Super Soft Please click the FAQ tab for our sizing descriptions Limited Quantity Printed Watch the Printing of the shirt:
